scripts.madge:check-build: madge --circular --extensions ts cmd/ && madge --circular --extensions ts internal/
scripts.build: npm run format && npm run format:check && npm run lint:check && npm run madge:check-build && tsc -b
scripts.dev:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production cross-env DEBUG=agentspace* node -r dotenv/config build/app.js
scripts.dev: npm run format && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=agentspace* nodemon --watch cmd --watch internal --ext ts --exec "tsx -r dotenv/config cmd/agentspace/main.ts"
